excerpt: "OpenAI claims its new tool can detect images by DALL-E with 99% accuracy OpenAI executives say the company is developing the tool after leading AI companies made a voluntary pledge to the White House to develop watermarks and other detection mechanisms for AI-generated content. Google announced its watermarking tool in August. ( Bloomberg)"
